content: c r o c h e t n a r w h a l p a t t e r n @olyasamoseienko - crochet narwhal pattern materials - yarn for body fins tail and horn i use yarn art jeans 55% cotton / 45% acrylic 1 8 oz / 174 yards / 160 m / 50 g colors 35 and 81 for body fins and tail use blue color or another that you like for horn use contrast color for example pink yellow etc - thin black yarn for embroidering i use yarn art iris 100% cotton 0 7 oz / 151 yards / 138 m / 20 g color 935 black you can use other thin yarn for example yarn for embroidery or sewing - stuffing materials i use hollow fiber - scissors - crochet hook i use 2 mm size size b to usa classification - needle pins @olyasamoseienko - crochet narwhal pattern 2 abbreviations ra amigurumi ring / magic_ring chain chain single_crochet single_crochet increase increase 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease decrease make 1 single_crochet from two stitch double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treable crochet flo front loop only * repeat x times sl slip_stitch total stitches in round 1 number of a round toys size ~ 6 7 inches 17 cm using the materials described work in a continuous spiral crochet level beginner american terminology used in the description @olyasamoseienko -
